helperTexts.name: Changes to your name will only be reflected on next login
helperTexts.libraries: Select specific libraries for this user, or leave empty to use default libraries

validation.librariesRequired: At least one library must be selected for non-admin users

message.clickHereForToken: Click here to get your token
message.adminAutoLibraries: Admin users automatically have access to all libraries

messages.clickHereForToken: Click here to get your token
messages.adminAutoLibraries: Admin users automatically have access to all libraries
messages.totpDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account by enabling two-factor authentication using an authenticator app (e.g., Google Authenticator, Authy).
messages.totpSetupInstructions: Click the button below to generate a QR code for setting up two-factor authentication.
messages.scanQRCode: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app, then enter the verification code below to enable TOTP.
messages.confirmDisableTOTP: Are you sure you want to disable two-factor authentication?

validations.librariesRequired: At least one library must be selected for non-admin users
validations.invalidTOTPCode: Invalid verification code. Please enter a 6-digit code.

auth.welcome2: To start, create an admin user
auth.insightsCollectionNote:
Navidrome collects anonymous usage data to
help improve the project. Click [here] to learn
more and to opt-out if you want
auth.totpVerifyMessage: Enter the 6-digit verification code from your authenticator app

validation.invalidChars: Please only use letters and numbers

page.invite: Do you want to add one?

file.upload_several: Drop some files to upload, or click to select one.
file.upload_single: Drop a file to upload, or click to select it.

image.upload_several: Drop some pictures to upload, or click to select one.
image.upload_single: Drop a picture to upload, or click to select it.

references.many_missing: At least one of the associated references no longer appears to be available.
references.single_missing: Associated reference no longer appears to be available.

message.bulk_delete_content: Are you sure you want to delete this %{name}? |||| Are you sure you want to delete these %{smart_count} items?
message.delete_content: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
message.error: A client error occurred and your request couldn't be completed.
message.invalid_form: The form is not valid. Please check for errors
message.loading: The page is loading, just a moment please
message.not_found: Either you typed a wrong URL, or you followed a bad link.
message.unsaved_changes: Some of your changes weren't saved. Are you sure you want to ignore them?

navigation.no_more_results: The page number %{page} is out of boundaries. Try the previous page.

notification.data_provider_error: dataProvider error. Check the console for details.
notification.i18n_error: Cannot load the translations for the specified language
notification.logged_out: Your session has ended, please reconnect.
notification.new_version: New version available! Please refresh this window.

message.transcodingDisabled: Changing the transcoding configuration through the web interface is disabled for security reasons. If you would like to change (edit or add) transcoding options, restart the server with the %{config} configuration option.
message.transcodingEnabled: Navidrome is currently running with %{config}, making it possible to run system commands from the transcoding settings using the web interface. We recommend to disable it for security reasons and only enable it when configuring Transcoding options.
message.songsAddedToPlaylist: Added 1 song to playlist |||| Added %{smart_count} songs to playlist
message.delete_user_content: Are you sure you want to delete this user and all their data (including playlists and preferences)?
message.remove_missing_content: Are you sure you want to remove the selected missing files from the database? This will remove permanently any references to them, including their play counts and ratings.
message.remove_all_missing_content: Are you sure you want to remove all missing files from the database? This will permanently remove any references to them, including their play counts and ratings.
message.notifications_blocked: You have blocked Notifications for this site in your browser's settings
message.notifications_not_available: This browser does not support desktop notifications or you are not accessing Navidrome over https
message.lastfmLinkSuccess: Last.fm successfully linked and scrobbling enabled
message.listenBrainzLinkSuccess: ListenBrainz successfully linked and scrobbling enabled as user: %{user}

config.exportSuccess: Configuration exported to clipboard in TOML format
config.devFlagsComment: These are experimental settings and may be removed in future versions
